title: Minnesota college leaders discuss 'The End of College'
description: Listen to two college presidents and one chancellor respond to Kevin Carey's 'The End of College' with some of their own ideas.
contentencoded:
Dateline:
Last month, MPR News' Kerri Miller talked to Kevin Carey about his new book "The End of College." That conversation—like his book—ruffled some feathers in the higher education community.

For this week's Friday Roundtable, we invited two college presidents and one chancellor to respond to Carey's ideas with some of their
